dataStructure.name: sid.org.tmforum.tip.service.spec.cfs.role.CustomerFacingServiceSpecRole
dataStructure.description:
This class defines a ServiceSpecification, in terms of a set of ServiceSpecificationRoles, for a CustomerFacingService. This is the base class for defining ServiceSpecificationRoles that are used to represent the invariant characteristics of a CustomerFacingService. This enables the CustomerFacingService to be managed abstractly using ServiceSpecificationRoles. It also helps define the ServiceSpecification in terms of the functions that it has or provides. Please see the DEN-ng Service model for more details.

This entity is abstract

This entity is optional
dataStructure.label: CustomerFacingServiceSpecRole

child.name: customerFacingServiceSpec
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity *

This association end has aggregation shared

This association end is navigable

This association end is an end of association CFSSpecHasCFSRoles

This association end is optional
child.label: customerFacingServiceSpec

child.name: resourceFacingServiceSpecRole
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity 0..*

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is an end of association RequiresResourceFacingServiceSpecRoles

This association end is optional
child.label: resourceFacingServiceSpecRole
